ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( INCLUDES(Testing_Required__c, "Other"), INCLUDES(Testing_Required__c, "None required")), OR( ISBLANK( Other_Testing__c ), BEGINS(Other_Testing__c, 'Please specify testing details if "None Required" or "Other" selected.')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must specify testing details if "None Required" or "Other" selected for Testing Required.
